subject: New review (3★) of Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback (from me m.)
description_text: Rating: 3 | Review Text: Do the job but came without a data cable (usb) or power cable and every time I plug the power to the box itself it’s spark very weirdly and I am not sure how safe it is but works well with simhub ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ This review was automatically published.Learn more You have a new 3-star review of Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback from me me lirya1001@gmail.com me me Display name: Me M. Do the job but came without a data cable (usb) or power cable and every time I plug the power to the box itself it’s spark very weirdly and I am not sure how safe it is but works well with simhub View, Reply or Share Unpublish review This email is sent for 0a6bb1.myshopify.com Unsubscribe

conversations.body_text: Hi ​Me M.   Sparks are normal — the motor’s capacitor needs to charge when the power is connected. This will not damage the control board, and the voltage is only 24V, so there’s no need to worry. Our power supplies are custom-made by certified manufacturers and have passed multiple safety certifications.
